title: Is it Over for Bernie? (Ep 1201)
description:
In this episode, I address the fallout from last night’s Democrat Primaries and what it means for the Trump team. I also address the 21 words uttered by the FISA court that destroy silly liberal narratives. Finally, I address the troubling misinformation that continues to flow from China regarding the Coronavirus. 

News Picks:


Pressure mounts on Bernie Sanders to drop out.

The Democrats want to cancel the debates because they want to hide Joe Biden.

The politics surrounding the Coronavirus will not end any time soon. 

Can President Trump expand the electoral map and win some blue states in 2020?

The Democrats’ Primary is sending gun sales soaring!


The 21 words the that changed the collusion hoax case in the FISA court.
